quote: It does, Tennyson, because there’s a fine line between confidence and arrogance. There’s a fine line between being assertive and being a bully. And you’re on the wrong side of both lines.
quote_letters: IT DOES TENNYSON BECAUSE THERES A FINE LINE BETWEEN CONFIDENCE AND ARROGANCE THERES A FINE LINE BETWEEN BEING ASSERTIVE AND BEING A BULLY AND YOURE ON THE WRONG SIDE OF BOTH LINES
